items.summary: In the Hero component (frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx), fix the text color of the second CTA button identified by XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[1]/div[1]/div[4]/div[1]/div[2]/button[2] so that its label text is clearly visible. Apply a high-contrast text color (e.g., white or dark green) that is legible against the button's background. Ensure the button label remains readable in all states (default, hover, focus).
